QuestData.Title: Three Feet Under
QuestData.RewardText: I can honestly say I never thought I'd see the premier Horde commander walking through an Alliance garrison.$B$BThen again, I never thought I'd be caught while performing reconnaissance for the Dark Lady and stuffed in a hole in the ground left for dead.$B$BI'm clearly not going anywhere without your help. If you help me out of this hellhole, I'll serve under your banner. My solo run has been decidedly less than pleasant.
